name: fymo
description: Production-ready Python SSR framework for Svelte 5

scripts.dev: npm run build:runtime && python3 ensure_runtime.py && source venv/bin/activate && python -m gunicorn server:app --bind 127.0.0.1:8000 --reload
scripts.start: python3 ensure_runtime.py && source venv/bin/activate && python -m gunicorn server:app --bind 127.0.0.1:8000
